install.name: Library
install.author: Lukáš Beránek
install.description: This plugin enables you to use any library. It was build to provide means of integrating with Zend Framework library, but if you set up include path relatively from the JOOMLA document root you can use it to load any standalone library.

param.name: paths
param.label: Library paths
param.description: Enter desired paths separated by semicolon.
